channel.title: Hypothetical is the game
channel.description:
The game is simple: present a hypothetical situation and the next poster has to give an answer to what he would do, and present a new hypothetical situation.
situation: offered a super power of your choice in exchange for a body part of your choice, what would you do? (I'm sure you will think of better ones)

item.title: Hypothetical is the game
item.dc:creator: gordonfreemantshepha
item.description:
Bluemen230:

This

If you suddenly became a moderater who would be the first person you would ban?

Swampfox, the black mesa retard must be banned. I would also ban anyone that had previously banned me. If your question applies to both the black mesa forum and chat.

Read full topic

item.title: Hypothetical is the game
item.dc:creator: mouserider
item.description:
definately. even if there wasn’t air in the tires, i’d pump them up only to get as far as possible from this boring place. unfortunately my bike has more problems than the lack of air in it’s tires…

if you found a bag with three cute little kittens starving on the side of the road what would you do?

-kick them to the middle of the road
-take them and feed them to a mad dog
-take them home, give them a shitload of fish and then cuddle with them when you go to bed

Read full topic

item.title: Hypothetical is the game
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
Then I’ll answer the previous one.

saivert:

If your entire life was on tape. what would you erase?

Cut all of age 14, and give only brief glimpses of 18, 19, and 20.
The first chunk of birth-through-13 would be introduction, then starting at 15 it would provide a new perspective and raise the stakes to a climax, giving brief glimpses of the next three years to put them in a light of chaotic narrative. That scene would be followed up at age 21 in some slow story of tragedy with some focus on that January. And conclude the film once I die or marry, to make it seem conclusive.

Keeping the parts Danson mentioned in order to reflect the duality of man.

(Oh, and also cut most of the parts when I’m asleep, to keep the pace consistent.)

If you were inside typing and it was nice outside, and you suddenly realized there’s still air in your bike’s tires, would you go for a bike ride?

Read full topic

item.title: Hypothetical is the game
item.dc:creator: DansonDelta40
item.description:
All the perverted porn I fapped to. Dun wanna go to jail! :fffuuu:

No, I won’t post another question. I’m too tired right now.

Read full topic

item.description:
accidentally hanging myself with a 90 feet rope from a 100 feet bridge while an anvill is tied to my leg.

if one of your friends tied your leg to a pipe with a chain and gave you a saw to cut off your leg in order to escape, how long would it take to realize he’s not screwing with you?

If he killed you before lunch what would you do

Be dead.

item.title: Hypothetical is the game
item.dc:creator: Doop
item.description:
robot_deodorant:

I would wait for the other prisoners to arrive in the cafeteria and/or eating area, then I would find the biggest guy there, pull down my pants and take a giant shit in his lunch.

Situation: If step one didn’t go as planned… how would you be able to deal with yourself?

Rip off his head and shit down his neck.

If he killed you before lunch what would you do

I would wait for the other prisoners to arrive in the cafeteria and/or eating area, then I would find the biggest guy there, pull down my pants and take a giant shit in his lunch.

Situation: If step one didn’t go as planned… how would you be able to deal with yourself?

item.title: Hypothetical is the game
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
acade365:

I would love to visit the shire or rivendell.

If you could live in any country other than the one you are living now and/or the country where you were born, which country would you choose?

It’s a tie between Australia, Japan, and the UK.

If you could choose to make one unhealthy food or drink healthy, which would you choose?

item.title: Hypothetical is the game
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
acade365:

The second option.

If you could cancel any current tv show, which one would you choose.

[COLOR=‘Black’]BTW, you failed to grasp the turkey sandwich reference.

AND THE TURKEY’S A LITTLE DRY?!?!

Xynos:

Obesity: The cardiac arrest would set in whilst I was munching through something tasty im sure.
If you could pick one person to be telekinetically linked to (you can talk to them by the power of thought), who would it be and why?

I wouldn’t pick anyone cause that would get really old, really fast.

Supposing you could choose the next non-original movie to be made, what source material and what director would you choose to make it?

Read full topic

item.title: Hypothetical is the game
item.dc:creator: Pokemon_Eater
item.description:
Doop:

iCarly

If every time you wished someone didn’t exist and it happened, would you regret having that ability

Maybe. What other idiot would more idiots turn to if they didn’t have Glenn Beck to listen to? Would my ability to grow and accept things for what they are be stagnated or non-existed if the bullies back in Middle School weren’t there to open my eyes?

Assume you had to die right now in whichever way you wanted. What would it be?

Read full topic
